item.title: Java RMI - 'PhÃ©p Dá»‹ch Chuyá»ƒn Tá»©c Thá»i' Cho Äá»‘i TÆ°á»£ng Java
item.description:
ChÃºng ta Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘i má»™t cháº·ng Ä‘Æ°á»ng dÃ i trong láº­p trÃ¬nh máº¡ng Java: tá»« viá»‡c tÃ¬m Ä‘á»‹a chá»‰ (InetAddress), táº£i ná»™i dung web (URLConnection), Ä‘áº¿n viá»‡c thiáº¿t láº­p kÃªnh giao tiáº¿p hai chiá»u tin cáº­y (TCP Socket), kÃªnh tá»‘c Ä‘á»™ cao (UDP Socket), vÃ  tháº­m chÃ­ “Ä‘Ã´ng láº¡nh” Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng Ä‘á»ƒ gá»­i Ä‘i (Serialization). s BÃ¢y giá», hÃ£y Ä‘áº¿n vá»›i má»™t khÃ¡i niá»‡m trá»«u tÆ°á»£ng vÃ  máº¡nh máº½ hÆ¡n: Java RMI (Remote Method Invocation - Gá»i PhÆ°Æ¡ng Thá»©c Tá»« Xa).

HÃ£y tÆ°á»Ÿng tÆ°á»£ng báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ ngá»“i á»Ÿ mÃ¡y Client vÃ  gá»i má»™t phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c cá»§a Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng Ä‘ang cháº¡y trÃªn mÃ¡y Server y nhÆ° thá»ƒ Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng Ä‘Ã³ Ä‘ang náº±m ngay trÃªn mÃ¡y Client cá»§a báº¡n. Báº¡n khÃ´ng cáº§n báº­n tÃ¢m Ä‘áº¿n viá»‡c má»Ÿ Socket, táº¡o ObjectOutputStream, hay xá»­ lÃ½ lá»—i máº¡ng. Báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n viáº¿t: remoteCalculator.add(5, 3) vÃ  nháº­n káº¿t quáº£.

ÄÃ³ chÃ­nh lÃ  phÃ©p mÃ u cá»§a RMI! âœ¨ NÃ³ táº¡o ra má»™t lá»›p trá»«u tÆ°á»£ng cao cáº¥p, che giáº¥u hoÃ n toÃ n sá»± phá»©c táº¡p cá»§a viá»‡c giao tiáº¿p máº¡ng, cho phÃ©p báº¡n xÃ¢y dá»±ng cÃ¡c á»©ng dá»¥ng phÃ¢n tÃ¡n (Distributed Applications) má»™t cÃ¡ch tá»± nhiÃªn theo Ä‘Ãºng phong cÃ¡ch HÆ°á»›ng Äá»‘i TÆ°á»£ng cá»§a Java.

Táº¡i Sao Cáº§n RMI? VÆ°á»£t LÃªn Socket CÆ¡ Báº£n

Láº­p trÃ¬nh Socket trá»±c tiáº¿p ráº¥t máº¡nh máº½ nhÆ°ng cÅ©ng ráº¥t “thá»§ cÃ´ng”:

  • Báº¡n pháº£i tá»± Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a giao thá»©c (protocol).
  • Báº¡n pháº£i tá»± xá»­ lÃ½ viá»‡c tuáº§n tá»± hÃ³a/giáº£i tuáº§n tá»± hÃ³a dá»¯ liá»‡u.
  • Báº¡n pháº£i tá»± quáº£n lÃ½ káº¿t ná»‘i, xá»­ lÃ½ lá»—i máº¡ng.

RMI tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hÃ³a táº¥t cáº£ nhá»¯ng viá»‡c nÃ y:

  • Giao thá»©c: RMI sá»­ dá»¥ng giao thá»©c riÃªng (JRMP) hoáº·c IIOP.
  • Tuáº§n tá»± hÃ³a: RMI tá»± Ä‘á»™ng dÃ¹ng Java Serialization.
  • Quáº£n lÃ½ káº¿t ná»‘i: RMI tá»± lo viá»‡c thiáº¿t láº­p vÃ  duy trÃ¬ káº¿t ná»‘i.

MÃ´ HÃ¬nh Kiáº¿n TrÃºc RMI: Ai LÃ m GÃ¬? ğŸ­

Má»™t há»‡ thá»‘ng RMI Ä‘iá»ƒn hÃ¬nh bao gá»“m:

  1. Remote Interface: interface Java káº¿ thá»«a java.rmi.Remote, Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a cÃ¡c phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c gá»i tá»« xa (pháº£i throws RemoteException). ÄÃ¢y lÃ  “há»£p Ä‘á»“ng”.
  2. Remote Object Implementation: Lá»›p Java implements Remote Interface, thÆ°á»ng káº¿ thá»«a java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject. Chá»©a code logic tháº­t sá»± trÃªn Server.
  3. RMI Registry: “Danh báº¡” cháº¡y trÃªn Server. Server Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½ (bind) Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng vÃ o Registry vá»›i má»™t tÃªn duy nháº¥t.
  4. Stub: Proxy cháº¡y trÃªn Client, cÃ³ cÃ¹ng kiá»ƒu Remote Interface. Client láº¥y Stub tá»« Registry thÃ´ng qua lookup(). Khi Client gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c trÃªn Stub, Stub Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i tham sá»‘, gá»­i qua máº¡ng.
  5. Skeleton (áº©n): PhÃ­a Server nháº­n yÃªu cáº§u tá»« Stub, giáº£i nÃ©n, gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c trÃªn Remote Object tháº­t, Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i káº¿t quáº£, gá»­i láº¡i cho Stub.

VÃ­ Dá»¥ Code Chi Tiáº¿t: MÃ¡y TÃ­nh Tá»« Xa

ChÃºng ta sáº½ táº¡o 4 file .java riÃªng biá»‡t.

// File: Calculator.java (Remote Interface)
import java.rmi.Remote;
import java.rmi.RemoteException;

public interface Calculator extends Remote {
    int add(int a, int b) throws RemoteException;
    int subtract(int a, int b) throws RemoteException; // ThÃªm phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c trá»«
}

// --------------------------------------------------

// File: CalculatorImpl.java (Remote Object Implementation)
import java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject;
import java.rmi.RemoteException;

public class CalculatorImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Calculator {

    // Constructor máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh (báº¯t buá»™c cho UnicastRemoteObject)
    protected CalculatorImpl() throws RemoteException {
        super(); 
    }

    @Override
    public int add(int a, int b) throws RemoteException {
        System.out.println("SERVER: Nháº­n Ä‘Æ°á»£c yÃªu cáº§u add(" + a + ", " + b + ")");
        return a + b;
    }

    @Override
    public int subtract(int a, int b) throws RemoteException {
        System.out.println("SERVER: Nháº­n Ä‘Æ°á»£c yÃªu cáº§u subtract(" + a + ", " + b + ")");
        return a - b;
    }
}

// --------------------------------------------------

// File: Server.java (Khá»Ÿi táº¡o, ÄÄƒng kÃ½)
import java.rmi.registry.LocateRegistry;
import java.rmi.registry.Registry;
import java.rmi.RemoteException;

public class Server {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        try {
            // 1. Táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng dá»‹ch vá»¥
            CalculatorImpl calculator = new CalculatorImpl();
            System.out.println("SERVER: ÄÃ£ táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng CalculatorImpl.");

            // 2. Táº¡o hoáº·c láº¥y RMI Registry Ä‘ang cháº¡y á»Ÿ cá»•ng 1099
            Registry registry;
            try {
                registry = LocateRegistry.createRegistry(1099); // Thá»­ táº¡o má»›i
                System.out.println("SERVER: ÄÃ£ táº¡o RMI Registry á»Ÿ cá»•ng 1099.");
            } catch (RemoteException e) {
                System.out.println("SERVER: RMI Registry cÃ³ váº» Ä‘Ã£ cháº¡y, Ä‘ang láº¥y tham chiáº¿u...");
                registry = LocateRegistry.getRegistry(1099);
            }

            // 3. ÄÄƒng kÃ½ (bind) Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng dá»‹ch vá»¥ vÃ o Registry
            registry.rebind("MyCalculatorService", calculator); // DÃ¹ng tÃªn khÃ¡c
            System.out.println("SERVER: ÄÃ£ Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½ 'MyCalculatorService' vÃ o Registry.");

            System.out.println("SERVER: Sáºµn sÃ ng nháº­n yÃªu cáº§u tá»« Client.");

        } catch (Exception e) { 
            System.err.println("SERVER: Gáº·p lá»—i: " + e.toString());
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

// --------------------------------------------------

// File: Client.java (Tra cá»©u, Gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c)
import java.rmi.registry.LocateRegistry;
import java.rmi.registry.Registry;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Client {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        String serverHost = "localhost"; 
        if (args.length > 0) {
           serverHost = args[0]; 
        }

        try {
            // 1. Láº¥y tham chiáº¿u Ä‘áº¿n Registry
            System.out.println("CLIENT: Äang káº¿t ná»‘i Ä‘áº¿n RMI Registry táº¡i " + serverHost + ":1099...");
            Registry registry = LocateRegistry.getRegistry(serverHost, 1099);
            System.out.println("CLIENT: Káº¿t ná»‘i Registry thÃ nh cÃ´ng.");

            // 2. Tra cá»©u (lookup) Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng tá»« xa
            System.out.println("CLIENT: Äang tÃ¬m dá»‹ch vá»¥ 'MyCalculatorService'...");
            Calculator calculatorStub = (Calculator) registry.lookup("MyCalculatorService"); 
            System.out.println("CLIENT: ÄÃ£ láº¥y Ä‘Æ°á»£c Stub cá»§a MyCalculatorService.");

            // 3. TÆ°Æ¡ng tÃ¡c vá»›i ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng vÃ  gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c tá»« xa
            Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
            while (true) {
                System.out.println("\nChá»n phÃ©p toÃ¡n:");
                System.out.println("1. Cá»™ng (add)");
                System.out.println("2. Trá»« (subtract)");
                System.out.println("0. ThoÃ¡t");
                System.out.print("Lá»±a chá»n cá»§a báº¡n: ");
                int choice = scanner.nextInt();

                if (choice == 0) break;

                System.out.print("Nháº­p sá»‘ a: ");
                int a = scanner.nextInt();
                System.out.print("Nháº­p sá»‘ b: ");
                int b = scanner.nextInt();

                int result;
                if (choice == 1) {
                    System.out.println("CLIENT: Gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c add(" + a + ", " + b + ") tá»« xa...");
                    result = calculatorStub.add(a, b); 
                    System.out.println("CLIENT: Nháº­n káº¿t quáº£ tá»« Server: " + result);
                } else if (choice == 2) {
                     System.out.println("CLIENT: Gá»i phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c subtract(" + a + ", " + b + ") tá»« xa...");
                    result = calculatorStub.subtract(a, b); 
                    System.out.println("CLIENT: Nháº­n káº¿t quáº£ tá»« Server: " + result);
                } else {
                    System.out.println("Lá»±a chá»n khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡.");
                }
            }
            scanner.close();
            System.out.println("CLIENT: Káº¿t thÃºc.");

        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.err.println("CLIENT: Gáº·p lá»—i: " + e.toString());
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}
